data.name: Jay's Walkin'
data.detailed_description:
In this free, turn-based, jaywalking puzzler, navigate the dangerous roads of Los Zorangelos while eliminating foes the only way you know how - walking. Jaywalking.

Play as Jay, legendary jaywalker, known in all of Calizorania. Many have heard tales of the countless followers he's gained and the heaps of corrupt foes he has slain in his path. In this dystopian world, disobey the world's most sacred law and confront danger as you move from one sidewalk to the next.

Jay's Walkin' includes...

  • deep lore
  • fun puzzles
  • adorable hand-drawn characters
  • dramatic cutscenes
  • a consistent source of serotonin
  • copious amounts of mole cops to manslaughter in the second degree

Your satisfaction or your money back!

data.short_description: Jay's Walkin' is the quintessential jaywalking experience! Feel the extreme thrills of breaking the world's most sacred law as you swerve through traffic ridden streets and evade corrupt law-bringers.
data.reviews:

10/10 – my mom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Anything from the past 20 years
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Potato
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
